meanings: (호된) severe, harsh, forced, rough, trying, unreasonable, straight, pure, unadulterated, unmitigated, dry, pretended

vlive.korean: [저 지금 요단강에 담갔다구요] 담궈먹는 거는... [I soaked myself in River Jordan] Soak it... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ITZY] 🎉영원한 한림퀸카 01즈의 졸업을 축하해🎉 (RYUJIN&CHAERYEONG’s graduation day!)

vlive.korean: 바다가 아니에요? 강? - 바다 아니에요 - 강이었어요? It's not the sea? River? - No, it wasn't the sea. - Was it the river? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 떡국 만들기🐥🍲
vlive.english: It's not the sea? River? - No, it wasn't the sea. - Was it the river?

vlive.korean: 없어요? - 근데 왜 낚시가 많지? 강이 있나? There isn't? - But why is there are a lot of fishing shops? Is there a river? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 🦊🐥🐰
vlive.english: There isn't? - But why is there are a lot of fishing shops? Is there a river?

vlive.korean: 강이 보이면 리버뷰 바다가 보이면 오 오션... "If you see the river, it's a river view. If you see the ocean, it's the ocean..." 듣기 View video VICTON : 찬이의 라디오 로맨스..🖤-@🌙
vlive.english: "If you see the river, it's a river view. If you see the ocean, it's the ocean..."
